pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Passive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Also have to update this!!!$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() Lettuce ig. If this is still in the beta please ping Blackout#8899 to update this

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Never eat strange plants you see in the world randomly! That’s what wild chickens did. Which made them become Lettuce Chickens! Lettuce Chickens know all about the world of lettuce. That’s why, instead of just eggs, they will also produce lettuce seeds!
